alert.note: Alert for Camden; Chowan; Eastern Currituck; Gates; Hertford; Northampton; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 11:56PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NORTHAMPTON...GATES... NORTHWESTERN CURRITUCK...NORTHWESTERN CHOWAN...NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN... NORTHWESTERN PASQUOTANK...NORTHWESTERN PERQUIMANS...HERTFORD...ISLE OF WIGHT...SOUTHAMPTON...SOUTHEASTERN YORK...NORTHEASTERN SUSSEX... SOUTHEASTERN JAMES CITY...SOUTHEASTERN GLOUCESTER AND SURRY COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF NORFOLK...THE CITY OF CHESAPEAKE...THE CITY OF HAMPTON...THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS...THE CITY OF FRANKLIN...THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH...THE CITY OF SUFFOLK AND THE CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH THROUGH 115 AM EST... At 1156 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Bavon to near Waverly to near Conway. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Newport News, Murfreesboro, Courtland, Wakefield, Surry, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Gloucester Point, Conway, Woodland, and Newsoms around 1200 AM EST. Franklin, Chowan University, Seaford, Ivor, and Sedley around 1205 AM EST. Como, Hunterdale, and Fort Eustis around 1210 AM EST. Patrick Henry Field, Suffolk, Zuni, and Denbigh around 1215 AM EST. Winton, Tabb, and Carrsville around 1220 AM EST. Smithfield, Windsor, Holland, Isle Of Wight, and Cofield around 1225 AM EST. Hampton and Roduco around 1230 AM EST. Gatesville, Christopher Newport University, Gates, Rescue, and Beaconsdale around 1235 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Vicksville, Milwaukee, Tunis, Pons, Rudee Heights, Carrollton, Portlock, Lackey, Longview, and Pierceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
